document.description: You have to have the card number plus ... footlong from Subway? Healthy fast food restaurant ... does papa johns take american express credit card?

What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question Kay Member since: May 21, 2009 Total points: 121 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Does papa johns take credit cards for delivery? I need to know this because i am hungry 2 years ago Report Abuse by lala Member since: July 10, 2009 Total points: 988 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker yes haha they do it online too 2 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: THANKS im full now ahaha Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (7) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by gary s Member since: March 31, 2007 Total points: 15,776 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Yes,but you have to warn them to bring an addressograph machine for the receipt.You can order online directly with a credit card from their website,usually with a discount and online coupons.I think they take Paypal online as well. Source(s): Delivered for Domino's and order Papa John online regularly. 2 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by CGBaker Member since: November 21, 2009 Total points: 13,081 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Yes. You have to have the card number plus the three digit number on the back of the card for placing orders by phone or internet. 2 years ago Report Abuse by A Hazy Shade Of Winter Member since: January 29, 2010 Total points: 160 (Level 1) Add Contact Block yes, over the phone while your ordering your pizza 2 years ago Report Abuse by Cobb19 Member since: July 02, 2008 Total points: 190 (Level 1) Add Contact Block yes, they will ask for the card info. over the phone 2 years ago Report Abuse by Carn D Member since: June 12, 2008 Total points: 14,228 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Yes, they are. 2 years ago Report Abuse by Casy Member since: December 19, 2008 Total points: 1,112 (Level 3) Add Contact Block yes :) my boyfriend works there so i would know :) lol 2 years ago Report Abuse by Laura468... Member since: November 12, 2007 Total points: 641 (Level 2) Add Contact Block yes 2 years ago Report Abuse
